data.eml:eml: The soft ticks (Parasitiformes: Ixodida: Argasidae) of Mexico: species, hosts, and geographical distribution

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guzmán-Cornejo, Carmen, Herrera-Mares, Angel, Robbins, Richard G., Rebollo-Hernández, Andrea (2019): The soft ticks (Parasitiformes: Ixodida: Argasidae) of Mexico: species, hosts, and geographical distribution. Zootaxa 4623 (3): 485-525, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4623.3.3
